content_descriptors.notes: The game contains images of scenes of violence that can have a negative impact on the psyche. Some content items may not be suitable for certain age categories. A reasonable restriction of the game audience is recommended.

name: The Whistle Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 | AMD FX-6350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti, 2 GB | AMD Radeon RX 460, 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670 | AMD Ryzen5 1600
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 6GB or AMD Radeon RX 580 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Dave Wilson is a 20-year-old boy who likes to go camping. Little did he know what would happen once he explored the forest of Harmony Hus Lake.
